Class TablesView

java.lang.Object
main.AbstractView
main.TablesView
public class TablesView extends AbstractView
Represents a view for displaying and interacting with a list of tables.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TablesView(TablrManager mgr, LayoutInfo layoutInfo, ViewList viewList)
    Constructs a new TablesView instance to manage and display a list of tables.

  • Constructor Details

    • TablesView

      public TablesView(TablrManager mgr, LayoutInfo layoutInfo, ViewList viewList)
      Constructs a new TablesView instance to manage and display a list of tables.
      Parameters:
      mgr - the TablrManager instance used to manage table data and actions

  • Method Details

    • handleDoubleClick

      public void handleDoubleClick(int x, int y)
      Handles a double-click event at the specified coordinates within the view. This method determines which table, if any, was clicked based on the y-coordinate and switches to a new design view for the clicked table. If no table is found at the given position, a new table is added.
      Specified by:
      handleDoubleClick in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the double-click event.
      y - The y-coordinate of the double-click event.

    • handleSingleClick

      public void handleSingleClick(int x, int y)
      Handles a single-click event at the specified coordinates within the view. This method determines the clicked element based on the y-coordinate. If the click occurs in the left margin, the corresponding table is marked as selected. If the click occurs on the table name, the view switches to editing the table name.
      Specified by:
      handleSingleClick in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the single-click event.
      y - The y-coordinate of the single-click event.

    • handleEscape

      public void handleEscape()
      Handles the escape event within the view. does nothing.
      Specified by:
      handleEscape in class AbstractView

    • handleBackSpace

      public void handleBackSpace()
      Handles the backspace key event within the view. does nothing.
      Specified by:
      handleBackSpace in class AbstractView

    • handleCtrlEnter

      public void handleCtrlEnter()
      Handles the ctrl+enter key event within the view. does nothing.
      Specified by:
      handleCtrlEnter in class AbstractView

    • handleEnter

      public void handleEnter()
      Handles the enter key event within the view. does nothing.
      Specified by:
      handleEnter in class AbstractView

    • handleDelete

      public void handleDelete()
      Handles the deletion of selected tables from the view.
      Specified by:
      handleDelete in class AbstractView

    • handleCharTyped

      public void handleCharTyped(char keyChar)
      Handles a character typed within the view. does nothing.
      Specified by:
      handleCharTyped in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      keyChar - The character that was typed during the input event.

    • paint

      public void paint(Graphics g)
      Paints the list of table names within the view. Selected tables are marked with an asterisk symbol (*) to the left of their name.
      Overrides:
      paint in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics object used for rendering the table names.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Retrieves the title of the current view.
      Specified by:
      getTitle in class AbstractView
      Returns:
      the title of the view.
